name: predict_ac_temp
text:
def predict_ac_temp(room_temp, humidity, outside_temp, occupants, time_str):
    hour = pd.to_datetime(time_str, format='%H:%M').hour
    input_df = pd.DataFrame([{
        'room_temp': room_temp,
        'humidity': humidity,
        'outside_temp': outside_temp,
        'occupants': occupants,
        'hour': hour
    }])
    input_scaled = scaler.transform(input_df)
    predicted_temp = model.predict(input_scaled)[0]
    return predicted_temp

name: rbfs
move
text:
def move(i, j):
    global battery, pos
    pos = [i, j]; battery -= 20
    print(f"Moved to {pos}, Battery: {battery}")

def recharge(): 
    global battery
    battery = 100; print("Recharged.")

name: dls
greedy_bfs
a_star
dfs
text:
def dfs(n, p, c, lim, vis):
    f = c + h[n]
    if f > lim: return f, None, 0
    if n == e: return f, p, c
    m = float('inf')
    for nei, cost in g.get(n, []):
        if nei not in vis:
            vis.add(nei)
            nf, res, rc = dfs(nei, p + [nei], c + cost, lim, vis)
            vis.remove(nei)
            if res: return nf, res, rc
            m = min(m, nf)
    return m, None, 0

def ida():
    lim = h[s]
    while True:
        f, path, cost = dfs(s, [s], 0, lim, set([s]))
        if path: return path, cost
        lim = f
